name: Prototype: Mending Mind
description:
Manual with pictures available in the download folder. Prototype Controls:
  • Numbers 1-5 (or mouse click on block) : Select a block to place.
  • ` key (or mouse click on switch button): Switch the blocks between basic and special.
  • Left click on grid: Place blocks
  • Hold left click: Place multiple blocks
  • Hold right click: Delete blocks
  • Drag and drop the player character with left click.
  • Q: Spawn ball and launch it with “Spwn speed” power at the angle shown by the ball at the top of the HUD. ----------
  • Left / right click ball with arrow:
  • Left / right click “Spwn Spd”: Change the starting speed by +/- 500.
  • Space / click pause icon: Toggle pause for the simulation.
  • R / click reset button: Reset layout

Change the spawn angle of the ball by 45 degrees

Special block explanation

 

1 - Blue switch: When touched, destroy all blue blocks in the level.

2 – Blue block: Gets destroyed by the blue switch.

3 – Speed boosts: When touched, double the ball’s current velocity.

4 – Spider web: Passing through it will slow down the ball.

5 – Black hole: Destroy the ball on impact
